ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core

Class FriendsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core.FriendsManager

  • public class FriendsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The FriendsManager provides all information about Friends locally stored on your phone
    He knows which friend is assigned to which shoppinglist.
